reviews.review_msg: Take the other reviews with a grain of salt. This term, Eva was available after class during lab to help with assignments, even staying with some students until almost 8pm on several occasions (class was 2:30-4:30, lab was 4:30-6:30). Final exam change, while annoying, was more SFU's fault than prof's. Lectures are a bit long though.

As experienced as Eva is in this field, this course has been a gong show in terms of organization. As late as the day before our final, 5/10 of our labs are unmarked. Lectures are overly content heavy with little to no discussion or practical application. Her friendly exterior is not a reflection of her approachability. Not taking 353.

If not already heavily engaged in course material, this class is very bleh. Professor was all over the place typically and was changing our final exam date multiple times up until a week before. Ta and prof were on different pages with little communication and labs had very poor instructions, so help from the ta was mandatory. Dont take unless need

Lectures easy to follow and all test materials came from the lecture, she's happy to answer any questions in class and goes over all tests with you. Labs can get a bit confusing but she makes herself available in the lab along with the TA to help you out.
GEOG 253. Class was unorganised but compensated by being very easy, would take for a GPA booster, but not to the most engaging learning experience.

Posts lectures late, does not explain content and labs super well. However, she grades fairly and easily and that is all that matters. This class is a GPA booster and I would take a class again with this teacher.

This prof would rarely post lectures and labs on time & took forever to answer emails. She always used lame excuses, such as not having wifi (Go to campus, or to starbucks!), being busy with her job, getting covid... This is the worst quality education i've had at SFU and don't recommend! It's not worth your tuition $.

I took Eva at TRU and if this course wasnt required, I never would have taken her. She is never available, never posts the course material on time, has a wonky sleep schedule that impacts you, and is very confusing. She does not care and basically leaves you to sink in an already difficult course.
Doesn't respond to any emails. Doesn't upload all the lecture content she says she's going to.
